IDS.name: Magnetics
IDS.documentation: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control.

field.name: IDS_Properties
field.documentation: Interface Data Structure properties; it can be placed at any node, allowing this node to be identified as an IDS and to be completed automatically by applications.

field.name: Status_of
field.documentation: Status of this structure 'OK' if the structure was created consistently, 'PARTIAL' if not complete, 'INCONSISTENT' if complete but not guaranteed consistent

field.name: Comment_of
field.documentation: Any additional comment from the source application

field.name: Source_of
field.documentation: Where do the data for this Data Item come from and where are they put

field.name: Date_of
field.documentation: Date of consistent creation of this IDS

field.name: Creator_of
field.documentation: Creator of this consistent IDS

field.name: Homogeneous_Timebase
field.documentation: 1 if the Timebase of this IDS is homogeneous. In this case, the Timebase values for this IDS are stored in ../Timebase just below the root of this IDS. Otherwise, the time values are stored in the various Timebase fields at lower levels in the tree.

field.name: Flux_Loops
field.documentation: Flux loops

field.name: Names
field.documentation: Names of flux loops.

field.name: Identifiers
field.documentation: IDs of flux loops.

field.name: Positions
field.documentation: List of (R,Z,phi) points defining the position of the loops (see data structure documentation FLUXLOOPposition.pdf)

field.name: R
field.documentation: Major radius

field.name: Phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle

field.name: Flux_Loop
field.documentation: Measurements by a given Flux Loop.

field.name: Flux
field.documentation: Measured flux.

field.name: Data
field.documentation: Measured flux.

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Flux_Error
field.documentation: Absolute error on measured flux.

field.name: Type
field.documentation: Type of errorbar description which is used. Refers to the name of the sibling fields.

field.name: Signal
field.documentation: Absolute error provided as a Signal of same dimension as the related field.

field.name: Constant
field.documentation: Relative error in % provided as a constant

field.name: Expression
field.documentation: Absolute error provided as an Expression.

field.name: Bpol_Probes
field.documentation: Poloidal field probes

field.name: Names
field.documentation: Names of the probes

field.name: Identifiers
field.documentation: IDs of probes

field.name: Centre_Positions
field.documentation: Position of coil centre. Note we should develop a generic RZPHI1D capable of inheriting Axis property from its parent.

field.name: R
field.documentation: Major radius

field.name: Phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle

field.name: Poloidal_Angles
field.documentation: Poloidal angles of coil orientation

field.name: Toroidal_Angles
field.documentation: Toroidal angles of coil orientation (0 if fully in the poloidal plane)

field.name: Areas
field.documentation: Area of coils

field.name: Lengths
field.documentation: Lengths of coils

field.name: Turns
field.documentation: Turns in the coils

field.name: Bpol_Probe
field.documentation: Measurements by a given Bpol_Probe

field.name: Magnetic_Field
field.documentation: Measured flux

field.name: Data
field.documentation: Measured flux

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Magnetic_Field_Error
field.documentation: Absolute error on measured magnetic field.

field.name: Type
field.documentation: Type of errorbar description which is used. Refers to the name of the sibling fields.

field.name: Signal
field.documentation: Absolute error provided as a Signal of same dimension as the related field.

field.name: Constant
field.documentation: Relative error in % provided as a constant

field.name: Expression
field.documentation: Absolute error provided as an Expression.

field.name: Processing_Methods
field.documentation: List of data processing methods

field.name: Processed_Data
field.documentation: Processed quantities derived from the magnetic measurements.

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Ip
field.documentation: Plasma current. Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above

field.name: Ip_Error
field.documentation: Error on plasma current

field.name: Type
field.documentation: Type of errorbar description which is used. Refers to the name of the sibling fields.

field.name: Signal
field.documentation: Absolute error provided as a Signal of same dimension as the related field.

field.name: Constant
field.documentation: Relative error in % provided as a constant

field.name: Expression
field.documentation: Absolute error provided as an Expression.

field.name: Diamagnetic_Flux
field.documentation: Diamagnetic flux

field.name: Diamagnetic_Flux_Error
field.documentation: Error on diamagnetic flux

field.name: Type
field.documentation: Type of errorbar description which is used. Refers to the name of the sibling fields.

field.name: Signal
field.documentation: Absolute error provided as a Signal of same dimension as the related field.

field.name: Constant
field.documentation: Relative error in % provided as a constant

field.name: Expression
field.documentation: Absolute error provided as an Expression.

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]
